title: Bug 120315: Display property set to "none" not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to "none" in the new PDF emitter, it doesn't take effect as expected.
OB: Label is still visible even after setting the display property to "none".
EB: Label should disappear when the display property is set to "none".
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the "properties" view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property of the label to "none".
4. Preview the document in PDF and verify that the label is no longer visible.
